products.description: This is an all-purpose loan granted to all members individually to finance development projects
This is a loan granted to members to finance emergency needs e.g sickness, natural disasters, or accidents
This is a loan granted to members to finance education needs e.g tuition fees, books and related expenses

loanApplication: Return loan form for appraisal and approval
Pay loan insurance fund of 1% of approved loan
Start paying loan promptly after a Grace period of one month.
